text: The Railhead Trilogy by Phillip Reeve is a set of 3 books. The books tell the story of Zen Starling in a fictional, future setting where sentient trains provide travel throughout the galaxy. == Trilogy == Railhead consists of three books: * Railhead (2015) * Black Light Express (2016) * Station Zero (2018) Category:Books by Philip Reeve Category:2015 books Category:2016 books Category:2018 books Category:Fiction books
title: Railhead Trilogy
